subject: Basketball (College)
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Justin Anderson scored 8 points during a critical 12-0 run to give Virginia a 50-47 victory at Virginia Tech on Sunday and preserve its undefeated record.
snippet: Justin Anderson scored 8 points during a critical 12-0 run to give Virginia a 50-47 victory at Virginia Tech on Sunday and preserve its undefeated record.
